Congratulations on your decision on buying your First Home.

Taking those first steps in buying your first home can be a bit tricky, this informational site is set up so that it can give you all the information to make buying your first home a breeze. As you journey through know that at any time you can refer back to our site at any stage.

Step One: Know your limit.



You may very well be asking yourself, where do I start? First of all KNOW what your limit is, KNOW what is already on the market, does it meet your needs. For instance have a list of what you would like in your first home either it be a home you want to reconstruct yourself or a home that is already decorated.

For example:

  1. Three Bedroom
  2. Double Garage
  3. One Bathroom
  4. Large backyard fully fenced
  5. Long Driveway away from the main roads
  6. Fully Insulated
  7. Modern Kitchen
